Description_lang: Hammer of Light $?a137028[grants Shield of the Righteous, erupts a Consecration beneath its target][applies Judgment to its targets], and increases your Haste by $432629s1% for $432629d.$?a137028[Additionally, Eye of Tyr grants $s2 Holy Power.][]

description_blz.en_US: Hammer of Light applies Judgment to its targets, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Martillo de Luz aplica Sentencia a sus objetivos y aumenta tu celeridad un 12% durante 6 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Martelo de Luz aplica Julgamento aos alvos e aumenta em 12% sua Aceleração por 6 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Euer Zauber 'Hammer des Lichts' belegt Ziele mit 'Richturteil' und erhöht Euer Tempo für 6 Sek. um 12%.
description_blz.en_GB: Hammer of Light applies Judgment to its targets, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Martillo de Luz aplica Sentencia a sus objetivos y aumenta un 12% tu celeridad durante 6 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Marteau de la Lumière applique Jugement à ses cibles et augmente votre Hâte de 12 % pendant 6 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Martello della Luce applica Giudizio ai bersagli e aumenta la tua celerità del 12% per 6 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Молот Света" применяет к целям "Правосудие" и повышает вашу скорость на 12% на 6 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 빛의 망치가 대상에게 심판을 부여하고, 6초 동안 시전자의 가속을 12%만큼 증가시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 聖光之錘會對其目標施加審判，並使你的加速提高12%，持續6秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 圣光之锤对目标施加审判，并使你的急速提高12%，持续6秒。
